THE WELL OF DOOM (1975).
 It deals with a father who tricks his three daughters into joining him on a mountain excursion to search for food. Deceiving his children, the father is actually searching for a hidden treasure relayed to him by an old monk.
 Three mysterious warriors enter into their lives leading to a supposed violent ending. More drama than martial arts opus, this was another film that sadly, was not released to DVD through IVL.

 Synopsis: "Wang Niu, an old herbalist ad his 3 pretty daughters (the mentally retarded Ta Niu, the beautiful Erh Niu and the young San Niu) live happily in the Valley of Dolls.
 One day the old man leaves to go to town and when he returns the 3 notorious bandits (Iron Helmet, Silver Spear and Yi Pai) rob him and push him over a cliff.
 The outlaws arrive at the house of the girls but Erh Niu senses that something is wrong and together with San Niu the girls trap the bandits in an old well. San Niu and Silver Spear, repenting, fall in love and he and the girls will fight the criminals."
